Umm i got  a problem 
I installed the game, copied the crack . and all im getting is the first few intros then my screen goes black and i hear the actual intro  but i don't see it . it's just a black screen . then after the intro i hear nothing and see nothing screen is still black . 
any idea ? thx

Hey guys.  I'm kinda new in this site, but not at torrents.  How ever when I try installing this game I get 1607:Installshield Scripting Runtime.  I turned off my Norton and my S&D, so is the problem my Daemon tool thats not working?

if the intro does not play then simply rename the video file in the root dir . it will be skipped and the game will carry on loading. also try running the program in xp mode (click properties on the exe file)
thanks for the game runs flawlessly on windows7 using daemon lite, will seed for awhile thanks again
This is an amazing simulator! Thanks!!
